j5vOPZIExb9lBnYxpAmbGQ.text: Place is clean and nice. I wanna give it more stars because the food is not bad (not great tho) but the price just doesn't add up for what they give you. 2 pita sandwiches probably should cost $20. Chicken salad probably should be $12. Also I hate being nickel and dime'd for small stuff like 75 cents to add tomatoes. Plenty of other gyro spots that are just as good for cheaper.

NdcBK5KeDgaFSP9ZaYJDNg.text: Yum! So Fresh and delicious! The greekumbers were so delicious, I'm addicted! So good! We had two gyros with a Greek salad, the were tasty, very flavorful! Will definitely be going back!

sWlOENqrbJxCP9hg10PASQ.text: All of the dishes have so much flavor! Service is quick and the place is spotless. Try the Mikas Fries if you are feeling adventurous. I love the modern feel of Mikas and if you like Siracha, you will be in heaven.

GBD-YjcOD1nG0wv4L0Lvfg.text: The food is amazing. Staff is super friendly. Place is clean and really nice. Had the Greek sampler and a side of lamb. It was yummy.

a0MgtCP7bFgnfuDPEzYVAw.text: This review requires very little, All I want to say is you have to eat here. Me and my wife are frequent customers and we recommend Mika's Greek to everyone we know. The food is absolutely amazing, like the melt in your mouth chicken souvlaki is a must. They also have the valleys #1 Greek salad in my opinion. Defiantly go for dinner tonight :-)

ApKsv3KOGsAj0xif9f86mw.text: Very good, fresh salad. Chicken perfectly spiced.

YlqEitMaMZawji7ZOiQrow.text: This location has been many different restaurants over the years - this is a tough spot. This is my favorite thing it's been though.   The food is great here and the owner is cool. The prices are really reasonable and the portions are large. The place is really clean and the decor is nice. Everything is cooked in plain sight, so there's no mystery.   My only complaint would be that he doesn't deliver yet. We definitely need a good gyro place that delivers in the area.  Seriously though - the food is really delicious. If you like flavors - it's all really flavorful. Great hummus too. Try the pizza puff.

q-CutvGoUVc9Kb_cOnc8xg.text: Went here after a couple of months. The place is now almost 2-3 times bigger. Very clean. The waiters are very nice and orders come up really fast. Ordered the falafel pita sandwich and it was really good. Would definitely recommend this for a quick greek lunch :)

Knc98SjWN425ersfUNGpnA.text: Very good and freshly prepared "quick food" Greek/Med food, clean modern space with nice seating. I just moved into the neighborhood and was delighted to find Mika's...and find is the key word.  It is located in the Papago Plaza strip mall ( abit of 1950's Pueblo Kitsch) and like pretty much all the businesses there has no road signage.  It is on the southwestern side of the mall on the Scottsdale Road side.  Worth looking for!

FIDyJfP0xK33_WE2g0wQXA.text: I love a good Gyro and this place makes them AMAZING! I ordered a traditional Gyro to go and was out the door in less than 5 minutes (good for my lunch break). I plan on going again for lunch today!

Li1xS0xE6Xe0WSK0c-YGuA.text: This place is so delicious. I work nearby and always stop here once a week for lunch. Tried almost everything on menu and everything is delicious. Of course their gyro sandwich is my favorite.

1TOQxYTh9EZiPYkiMLcUwQ.text: Loved it!  I honestly did not expect much when coming to this restaurant. But, it's got an awesome little vibe  to it, great prices, and good food.  The front hostess/cashier, Amy, was super friendly and totally cool! She was very helpful with getting my order exactly right , which really meant a lot!   I gave it 5 stars because of the food quality compared to the low price and because of the Amy at the front....

4gvxRM-mIZY8sFbYr_NniA.text: I'm not an expert on greek food but I love this place. Good, quickservice and the gyros are just how i llike em.

S5FoGF7YF_g0K6rARltbrA.text: Don't judge a book by its cover, considering this is in Papago Plaza. Mikas Greek is very nice inside, with a modern twist. The food is always fresh and the customer service is on point.

6Vb0websEarGRNWD33VQ5Q.text: Love the food here, this is our go to place  for lunch or fast take out dinner. Do not get this place confused with Georges on McKellips  and Miller with failing health inspections.

zlMEKq7yDUmoRx_BnhxjMg.text: Delicious hummus, I like both the traditional and jalapeno versions and the pita bread is soft and chewy but still holds up to scooping up hummus. The staff is friendly and it's perfect for picking up lunch on the go or to take back to the office.

nTMitpMoED5bT19T2tI3iA.text: Yum! I love the spicy gyro...can't remember it's name, but it was really good. They give you a lot of meat. I mean, really a lot of meat...which is what I like. If you order your food to go, they put it in a nice aluminim-kind of thingie which keeps your food hot. My drive was about 30 min before I got home and my gyro was still hot. The fries was gone by the time I got to the freeway though...it was delish!

svx1as9_FCDyhaDQLCopww.text: AMAZING! Awesome staff. Food was fresh and delicious and fast. I am right up the street from this place and I am happy that I can walk here and get good foods. Mediterranean pita and Greek fries! Do it!

1q5z-kw7HsEgo7tEkZFCpw.text: Best Greek food I've had in Scottsdale!! The traditional gyro and Greek salad was delicious! Best gyro meat I've ever had! Can't wait to come back! We highly recommend this place. It's right by Dutch Bros coffee off Scottsdale Rd & McDowell... next to a barber shop. Also should mention the cleanliness is excellent! Nice seating too & friendly service!

-xsub0N_mMKozU7EbQ3A4g.text: This is a medium size greek restaurant on the side of Papago Plaza - I wish it was at a more visible location. This year they renovated their place and improved their menu.  I come here twice or thrice a week for lunch as it closest and best place to eat near my workplace.  Even though I prefer eating at home, it is not always feasible, so Mika comes to my rescue.  I do feel that their food has too much of sodium, atleast more than what should be there is a healthy food. I know that high sodium content in food is a problem all across US, but it doesn't hurt expecting from a place you eat out a lot.

YPM3rE_8Y_yCebDGrOMqfA.text: Close to work. Easy and fast. Will go back.  Don't need to write more just because I think it's simply good.  RL

zW6sdUhaJXKUdHQBdARCzA.text: Very clean and inviting restaurant.  Had the Greek fries and Mediterranean gyro with gyro meat.  Food was hot and very tasty.  Good portions, couldn't even finish it all!   I love gyros and will definitely come back here to try other menu items.  The price was very good for the quality and the portion size.

I8V3urzlBNE0xRGkd_pshA.text: Best Gyro I've had in years.  Tatziki (sp?) is PHENOMENAL.  I wish they sold it in jars.

AO8hb-Yrq6pyWHHn-W25qA.text: LOVE living so close to this quick lunch/dinner spot!  The greekpeno with falafel is my go to every time! Fast friendly service and the place always looks nice and tidy.  Also, their pita is delicious!

rxeUF5g-kjW7eiN7QI6UiA.text: Visiting from California. Love Greek. I had another Greek/Mediterranean while I was here. Mika's was much better quality and the service was speedy. For the price it is Definitely one of the best Greek restaurants I have tried. Give it a shot!

domtNTB24K9b1KzR63xPuQ.text: Okay, just yes. Mikas is awesome, I love the modern update they made to the inside of the restaurant last year.   The food is so good!! I love the euro meat but the chicken is great too. Last night, I tried the Diablo wrap and it was the perfect amount of spicy. The Greek fries are an absolute must- fresh French fries with Greek dressing and feta cheese. I mean, feta cheese and French fries, obviously it's good.  The employees are friendly and it's quick and fresh. I really recommend! It's in the plaza off McDowell and sky song road. check it out!

FXsXK64kSDqVovWr9yjV5A.text: Delicious! Wasn't to fond of the service. Wasn't to busy and still had to wait 15 mins. Food was very good!

jtHfGwbQFFxVXjuGlP7IDQ.text: Highly recommend this place. I order the Greek salad and Euro and have had a few other items here as we'll. All have been very good. The people here are always very friendly and provide good service. As far as the price, its very similar to many other Greek restaurants I've visited. Great healthy food and worth every penny.

Ez9phbuBbUvqfPI0HoJoGQ.text: This place is really nice and clean inside.  I ran inside to order my food and the cashier (I think her name was Amy?) helped me out.  I paid and ran back to my car that was still running because my dog was inside.  I usually never take him with me in the summer but the power was out in my neighborhood and it was too hot to leave him home.  I explained my situation to the lady at the counter.  Anywho, I saw her pack my food...and then she brought it out to me.  I know this is a simple act, but it really means a lot to me when someone takes an extra step to make your day easier or better.  The chicken was amazing!!  But I mostly give 5 stars for the customer service!! I will be back soon!! Thanks Amy :)

gNJFZ26vD2TQ7V45mVT0hA.text: Chicken, gyro and flafel, was over cooked and flavorless. For this quality of food, it was way over priced and not edible at all.

8NVhVa2EqlQAcZ3w42LAJg.text: Best Greek food I've had thus far! I get it all the time! Love the jalapeno cilantro hummus and the chicken skewers.

Ide5Y3zJXO1JubVcWUtLPA.text: I have been coming here since before it was Mikas and they always do a good job!  I wish the prices were a bit lower, but the place is big and I would assume its a fairly high-rent area. That aside I have never had a bad meal here, the portions are good, and you all know I love my Gyros!  The service is fast, and the food is fresh, they have plenty of seating and the ambiance is nice.

3uqtwJRbmoWRdnraynj6ww.text: Love the redesign inside! Food was great. Me & my sister split the Greek salad, Mika fries & baklava sundae. Food came out quickly and was delish!! I'll be back...

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Greek salad
Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mika fries
Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Baklava sundae

aDpPfeTNOAn9b8i-8KhqsA.text: I was impressed. Their falafel and gyro were amazing. Their Dolmeh was a bit cold and their Greek fries had too much feta. I hope they also fix their ice machine.   For some reason this place reminds me of chipotle... Which is a good thing. Overall I was full and satisfied.

UZazsxQbL93zQ3EhEFszRg.text: Amazing food, lovely modern atmosphere, and great service. Love the classic gyro. Also have Great desserts, recommend highly.

SZ6HNJUhyS_vbBtHlvGBuA.text: My go-to Greek joint. I recommend the original gyro or the jalapeno hummus with chicken. Very friendly staff....this place is SUH GUUUD

kDGrMEEEJorXCiMaX83SGQ.text: Great ambience. Nice decor and pleasant environment. Tasty food, nice service. Huge options to choose from. One of the nice Greek restaurants in the valley.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Greek chicken with lentil soup

CBdCUqJ8rQ3rf4ybG2wiHQ.text: Love this place! Tucked away and hidden in Papago Plaza by a barber shop. It is worth finding this gem. Love the Greek food. Not greasy at all and tastes delicious!! Very health conscious here and the restaurant is clean and cute.

jTNhsh66RD8YnPUb6YiNVw.text: Greek food is on the top of my list so I can be a bit critical. With that said, this place is incredible. Service is always great and the food even better. Authentic high quality Greek food. Try the Picado Pita or the Greeks fries. Def won't be disappointed.

5YR7s-8M9vFVC6lYqqVrbA.text: The small gyro platter with soup is a go-to lunch... hearty and always good.

FrQc72bK1iqfU20j_Lgaug.text: Fast, Reasonably priced, Delicious! i always go with the Mediterranean pita with gyro meat, and the greek salad, never disappointing!

UnUBb1_c3OncIRmfwKlzXQ.text: For a quick work lunch we decided to give Mika's a try.  I could not have been more pleased with our choice.  They have a very nice menu selection.  I ordered the gyro platter.  The food was fresh, flavorful, well seasoned and the right temperature.  We were 5 people and our food came out very quickly and all at about the same time.  I will definitely visit again the next time I travel to Scottsdale.

2nS0EneUZEaUxB3VZrrgQg.text: My new go to Greek spot!  I live walking distance away and I'm glad I finally checked this place out. Everyone was so friendly, the place was clean, and the food was amazing. Will come back for sure

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Diablo pita and fries

eMkheTYBcZo8aWaLTalWwQ.text: I'm crazy for Mika's Greek. So far i have had the Caesar and the  diablo Caesar pitas. They are both so yummy. The pita bread always tastes so fresh with  grilled chicken that is seasoned just so.  For sides i have had the rice and also paid a bit more for the Greek fries which are topped with chunks of feta and drizzled with a vinaigrette (which they put on the side for to orders so they don't get soggy in the bag- smart). They are so tasty and different then #BasicBitchFries. I've been telling all my friends to go for awhile now so needed to write a review to tell the Yelpians to go!

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Oh hell yes! Greek Fries and Caesar chicken pita.

YFONFJa-KOCGSAbKaJN4xA.text: They had awesome food at an affordable price. We paid just under 8 bucks and got a large overflowing Gyro and it came with a side. I got a whole bowl of lentil soup. It definitely didn't disappoint! Wish we had some places like this near me.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Jp-Exoh6yozDQgGxSlTgPw.text: So much cleaner than all those grimy mom & pop Greek spots. Mika's is clean and modern. Lots of choices of meat, 2 kinds of chicken and beef, along with Lamb (gyro meat). It makes me happy that they have the coke machine with the hundred choice. I get the Greek salad with gyro meat. It's big with feta and red wine vinegar based dressing. It comes with a grilled pita on the side.

3B7MJu7Rw_Ejg_l7e0Y0Ig.text: Great place to pick up a flatbread sandwich and salad for lunch. The food is a great value, and always great service.

PJwcKYgcTY9B7w7KnH8MVQ.text: This place has lost me as a customer. I was eating here for lunch about once a week until they recently changed the menu.  Replacing gyros with wraps is a bad move.  If I want a wrap, I'll go to a sandwich place.  If I want a gyro, I'll go to a Greek restaurant.  But since the gyros are off the menu, I don't consider Mika's a Greek restaurant any more.  And even with the conversion to wraps, they eliminated my usual Greek Night Club. Good bye.

uYiJSEvsVbc6ItRdkOEisA.text: Love the falafel and hummus plate!!! It was deserted when I went and my food was ready very quickly!

fnhrminJzWrA3UXWNIyLAw.text: Amazing Greek food and the employees are always super friendly and helpful! Greekumbers are my fave

wiOJQSZTr3hevTW8j5O61w.text: I have had my share of a Greek food and this is amazing!  Fresh, flavorful and affordable.   If you are in Scottsdale you must check them out.  Indoor and outdoor seating is a plus, and it's not loud inside at all.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. My favorite!

Srdvt7sVjWCh7613S0-OBw.text: We were doing some business nearby and needed a quick bite to eat. Took a chance on this place and it was great. Good food, quick service, clean restaurant and very reasonable prices.

0H_ua0mMhrnDqno7ugp2ww.text: Great! Great! Great! I ordered enough to have leftovers, however it was so good, i couldn't help myself and ate it all. The whole menu is a go.

QTMXvYqOAxx8vn_m_lTgeg.text: I didn't like it at all food was cooked to much , the price for what you get expensive , never back again

PjtXj0DkhcS0WI37tZH-bw.text: Service was great and friendly. This place was the cleanest restaurant I've ever been to. It looks like they just opened. I see other reviewers posting about the cleanliness, (which I found strange, but now I understand why). The food was great.  We will definitely be back.

IM7OqPrek3kF7WgHAE1vTg.text: Go there right now and get yourself Mika's fries. It's an unbelievable concoction of fries, with some sort of incredible Greek balsamic dressing, loaded with juicy delicious gyro meat, the world's best tzatziki sauce and feta cheese. I almost ate to the point of throwing up because it was so good.

ADr93ZeM0yzyKyI0Jw50eQ.text: Mika's serves up quick, fresh, flavorful Greek food that you can take to go or eat in.  All food is made fresh to order.  The wait time for your food is normally 2-5 minutes depending on what you get, but when in rush, you can call an order in ahead of time.  They make everything from salads to gyros to full meals.  The prices are reasonable.  Its a great place for lunch or a simple dinner.  The restaurant is well maintained, modern, and very comfortable, but not easily spotted from N. Scottsdale Road.  They also offer free Wi-Fi.  This is my "go-to" place for something quick, tasty, and fairly healthy.  Check it out!

IMx9r0BMYQ8OIaxS0fPOEA.text: Absolutely love this place.  I ended up at this restaurant as my desire for Greek food was not satisfied at nearby locations.   The staff here are excellent.  Very friendly and very helpful if you have any questions with food options.  The restaurant is very clean and the food is very fresh.  I had the "Greek Night Club" Gyro and it was delicious.  You are given the option of sides ranging from fries to salad.  Value-wise I would say that it is excellent as I thought that the price was fair for the freshness of the food and I didn't leave hungry.

a5MPjmqJY2QNfPK1ujK4Gg.text: We stopped in for lunch.  Great "fast" Greek food.  The Greek Sampler was a great way to get a taste of everything.  The hummus was a bit salty, but the tzatziki sauce was amazing.  The vegetarian pita was so filling- large with grilled tomatoes, green peppers and onion.  You have to try the Greek fries- they tasted just like Greek roasted potatoes- with the added zing of some feta on top.  My husband said it tasted like a Greek wedding!  The gyros platter was plenty of food to split between too people.  The toasted pita that came with all meals were delish!  The only downside were the booths- you sink in when you sit- I would suggest some more padding in those or make sure you get a table with chairs.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Veggie gyro and Greek fries.
Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Gyros Platter...large is enough for two!
Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Greek side salad.

Jml6Mu2_bgF6uBss150Hyw.text: Everything was awesome. Olivios grill closed and  this is for sure my new Greek joint. Taziki was perfect. Yellow rice was full of flavor. My roommate had extra gyro meat and he said it it was almost TOO MUCH, but it was so good he ate every bite

UmABSmHoilM3mkKqZMvK5Q.text: Best gyro ever! We drive out of our way to come eat here and we've never been disappointed! Always good portions, fresh, and clean.

YuumDWt2vsyv3lu_1D8QtQ.text: Great food BUT the clerk, she didn't know anything about the yelp free drink with check-in..and then when we showed it to her she said it PROBABLY isn't for this location. YIKES better do some training. BUT we will return the food is great needs to be spicier on the spicy GYRO thou. I think I prefer the wild guys at the McKellips location

iVx7aFoc9iaE7uITP_oLBg.text: Love the Diablo pita. Great portions. I recommend the Greek salad or rice as a side. This will become a regular stop for me.

hwx9jASrJIsDiqrQeZI5Xw.text: Not to be confused by the George's Gyros on Mckellips and Miller.  This location is definitely a bar above that one.  The restaurant itself is very clean, air conditioned, and pleasant to be inside.  TV's are present to keep you entertained while you dine-in, or wait for your take-out order.  It was a little hard to find, as it's on the backside of Papago Plaza, I didn't even know this place was there until I found myself lost, and starving.  The food is pretty standard Greek food.  Delicious gyros, greek salad, etc., more often than not delivered by a Greek god of an owner.  It's nearly worth going to this place just to see him.

DiEh9nobbbpj1ZzYHa4LNQ.text: I'll keep it short and simple: food is GREAT, cool ambiance, and they have a Coke Freestyle soda machine to top it off!

Nh3dS6UbIYZzIGBZ9vnPfQ.text: Good solid Mediterranean cuisine - generous portions, both salads and pitas.  All food delicious except the lemon lentil soup, which was a lacking in taste.  It was a tad pricey for a lunch bite. Very friendly service

yxnktN6zAKIrb6n7XG60ug.text: The gyro sandwich and Greek salad were excellent. Looking forward to coming back in the future.

beAaJrlZkPZw1z8yNJTaHQ.text: The falafel is delicious and fresh. The Mediterranean pita is delicious. The tziki and hummus are great. Try the Greek fries. You won't be sorry. The service was good and the people were friendly. Everything was clean and welcoming. Put Mika's in your mouth.

qT_qfaw2fEOHNnEbz6Y1Nw.text: This place was great! For the prices, they really give you a good portion of well-cooked food. The Diablo gyro pita is delicious. Their Mika fries are delicious. The souvlaki has a really good flavor to it. You'd be hard pressed to find a Greek restaurant that'll have as good of food for the price. It's the same prices pretty much as pita jungle, but better food. The ambiance is modern and goes well. Service was good and the place is clean. I will definitely come back here again.

YV1pQ5K80elUKJaHY5i5NQ.text: Saw this place pop up on nearby restaurants because I live in the area and I have been looking for new places. I enjoy gyros and was skeptical until the food came out. The lentil soup was amazing but meat was outstanding. Best gyro meat I have had in the valley. Will be returning again and may become a very frequent take out spot for me. Creative pitas and flavors too so I can't wait to try more.

bglIbjM1izcbbyt4UMeeTA.text: Great. Quick accurate and always good. I like the whole menu. The desserts are really sweet and really good

fvODDmP5c8ds6qdtoN9VpQ.text: Fresh, delicious and conveniently quick! I've been twice and the food/service is consistently top notch. The "Chipotle" of Greek food

u8X8ugz9jG4X2ESFukOw_w.text: We were visiting Scottsdale for A few days we found this Greek restaurant. It is awesome excellent food great value would come back again and again and again

cpKu9KnYMGCVD37ns0jKdg.text: Don't really eat Greek food as it's not very popular locally.  But I would always try any food at least once.  And I really glad that I came to Mika's one night.  This place was tucked in the very back at a shopping plaza between Scottsdale & Tempe.  It was hard to find at first, but lucky I found this gem in time before they closed for the night.  I ordered Mediterranean Chicken Pita with Fries and my friend ordered Original Tyro Pita, also with Fries.  And since this is Greek food, Falafel appetizer is a must, so we ordered that as well.  The flavoring was very tasty, but I'm still not a fan of this type of food.  But at least I gave it a try, hopefully I"ll have better review next time.

CqRAyQ_6jT8bkC9y8xIzqw.text: I love Mika's.  My girlfriend and I often find ourselves wandering in once a week when we do not feel like cooking but dont want to eat garbage food out. In a society where we constantly have disgusting fake food pushed in our face it is nice to know there are still options out there that serve REAL food.  The service is phenomenal.  The ladies behind the counter are always very nice, even when we stroll in at 8:30pm and they close at 9pm (I'd be grumpy).  We usually dine in and the food is brought out to us in a very timely manner, usually still piping hot.  The food.  Every time I go I get the chicken picado with basmati rice. Every single time I get a tingly feeling in my loins after I eat it.  When I am balling out, I get extra chicken (more on this later).  I put some siracha on the rice and go to work.    I would probably eat here everyday if could and never get tired of it.  The ONE downfall.  Pricing.  It is decently priced for a standard meal ($7-$9).  However, if you like to spice it up and get extras you can really run up the tab.  Extra meat is $2.95 and extra veggies etc is $0.95.  Dont matter doe Ill still go back.

TT63gDOqDXt05i9tmycJ4w.text: Great food. Clean establishment and the portions are good size. I will definitely try this joint again, and try something new.

OkhlyxXhfqIiQRuury-NvA.text: I was in the area looking to kill sometime and grab a quick bite. When i stopped in and the place looked cute! Clean, nice staff, and the Menu looked pretty good.  i ordered the veggie souvlaki, and For $8 i would have expected more veggies than taziki sauce. It was basically dipping pita bread in taziki sauce and have maybe a small handful of chopped up veggies. I wont be coming back for the meal i had.

JgkbCR6Dzv1q_1jSPrWrCQ.text: Never had a bad visit here. This is the hidden gem of Scottsdale! Fresh food, friendly customer service, and no wait! If I had to pick one thing that stood out to me, it would have to be the cleanliness. Cleanest restaurant I've ever been to. Definitely recommend Mika's to all my friends!

l10LZ9xy8yWZPdVBWDFtlA.text: I stopped in at the recommendation of a friend. Sounded good so I thought I'd give it a try. It must have been somewhere between lunch and dinner when I got there as the place was barren. Clean, not too large, and I was greeted as I walked in the door. High marks for that. The menus are high tech and on digital TV screens above your head. The cashier / owner gave me a moment to figure out what I wanted. Not being too hungry, I chose a Greek salad and some Greek fries. Both were delicious! Ordering to-go or to stay I made the assumption it would all be packaged the same, but I was wrong. Since I dine in, my food was brought to my table on China with metal silverware. It was unexpected and quite nice. I'm definitely going to go back for something more meaty. I highly recommend you do the same! Enjoy!

GojneTFXVHITm1xlDPH6-A.text: Great Service - super nice guy at the counter. Gyro Meat - AMAZING! Lots of meet in the Pita Location - Good Atmophere- SO So  I would hit this place up for take out!

ZZ3mNn0TuHg4JgbnEoCOLA.text: Great and very fresh fast food. I had a grilled chicken plate. The chicken is very tender and moist. Had a yummy Greek side salad with plenty of feta olives and chopped cucumber. Just visiting town or I'd become a regular

GUDNoGLjzkxDFbLu5-wmBg.text: I found this place on Yelp and I am so happy I did! I live right down the street and order takeout from Mika's pretty regularly.  I can't say enough about the food. it always tastes fresh and healthy! I love to get the Greekpeno Pita with jalapeno hummus and chicken. The falafel here is also amazing. Everyone I have taken here has enjoyed the food. Best part is that it's huge portions for a small price!

uA9I5tAILiae2olCOrSvZw.text: We eat there a few times a month, food & service is always outstanding.  The place is very clean, they have a few tables out front.  Not much else in the old Papago Plaza, so lots of parking.  Highly recommend.

vgjhH7PmfsF6aca5CryLWQ.text: Yummy greek food, really liked it! I was looking for a place near old town with not too pricey food and Mika's Greek sounded like a good option! My boyfriend is not too adventurous when it comes to food and trying new restaurants, but he liked this place a lot and told me he'd like to come back.  It's kind of in a weird location, we went at night and had a bit of trouble finding it right away. Also there was a person being arrested directly in front of Mika's Greek which freaked us out a bit! There weren't too many people inside, we didn't have to wait to order which was nice. I ended up getting the appetizer platter with extra falafel with no domaldes. I asked if I could get rice instead of domaldes but she said you can only really ask for more falafel. Wasn't too expensive, and was a large quantity of food! My boyfriend went for the chicken with fries (one meat one side) plate. It also came with pita and tzatziki. My platter had falafel, pita, hummus, and tzatziki. It was really good! The hummus had a great texture and flavor. Tzatziki was a bit too garlicky for me, left me with smelly breath, but it was good! The falafel had a good flavor to it, I liked it a lot. I'd be happy to come back!

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Appetizer platter, no domaldes but extra falafel!

KAK-ERBGY9gITBigJmFKmA.text: Its either the grilled chicken or gyro Diablo that I go with and the lentil soup! You cant beat the price and the quality. Friendly staff, quick service, and most of all amazing food! You cant go wrong with this place!

LjQPC6XhC8F0TXT383gSGg.text: Love this place, great food and even faster service. I've been going here for awhile because I work right across the street at a tech company.

0WB-i-Q9VJH_KUPXRGLZkg.text: CLEAN, GREAT GREEK FOOD.  Why am I shouting?  Mika's is that modern and clean.  Did I mention the great gryros!  The meat was moist.  Fresh pita bread and fries.  There are other good gyros in the valley but this tops them

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

7lBxNlxKrUrPwJh-1WT9sw.text: This place is so put together, organized and delicious that I had always thought they were part of a national chain, but they are actually locally- and family-owned!  Big props to the Mikha family!  They have plenty of vegetarian options, and I always make sure to get a side of their lentil soup - it's amazingly delish and fresh tasting!  It's sort of the opposite of George's... :)  Highly recommended and I will always come back!

n8aihAplm3sET9LpAE2tiw.text: Nicholas Greek restaurant has a  rather hip vibe to it. Very pleasant to be in. Staff was courteous and accommodating. We ordered gyros, domaldes,  souvlaki, Greek salad, lentil soup, and Greek chicken.  The good: gyros and Greek salads were tasty. To be improved: The chicken was a bit dry. The souvlaki was overlooked, uninspired hamburger. The domaldes (stuffed grape leaves) were small and vegetarian without taste. The lentil soup was hot but low on flavor.  To get to the next level, Mika's should retain the services of somebody's Greek mother! Jim-The Critic

fq65Vft8RgDDvvkHldgJ-g.text: Great value, great customer service, and great food.  I get the greek night club, add chicken!

ZDLU6nFebbgETQ_eEnvs4A.text: Clean. Modern. Delicious. The Greek fries are soooo good and topped with TONS of feta. The Chicken Soulvaki is cooked perfectly. Service is prompt and prices are reasonable. Closed Sundays.

kshTG2DwP_qztwrbxzthSA.text: This place lacks authenticity and consistency! I understand the current owners are not Greek's but that should not stop them from making some delicious Greek food if invested. The price range is ok but the quality of the food is poor.

KT0E5Dj0W61cVsOcgQ2rYQ.text: Stopped in a few weeks ago while visiting the Scottsdale area.  Food was good, not great, service was good.  Not a bad place at all, just not a wow must try spot, but if you are in the area & in the mood for Greek I would not hesitate to try Mika's

K0AVwfyWdUK9aIiqS2JJCg.text: I found Mika's on Yelp. I decided to try it out because people mentioned the large portions. I ordered the Greek Night Club with chicken souvlaki with the side salad. The side salad was normal size; however, the pita was packed with large pieces of chicken, lots of tztatziki, feta, and veggies. It was so big I had to ask for another pita. I love both of their ice teas. As an after thought I ordered a half order of falafel. They taste freshly made and had the perfect spice. Definitely worth the money. Friendly staff. They even brought the food to the table when I ordered at the counter. I would have given them 5 stars but they did charge for me to add Greek pickles to my pita and they will charge extra for tztatziki. All in all, excellent quality food and great service.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

dVfvJ2B8KM_rMph9amSNXg.text: This is a new find for us. We really like it! The food is good, really fresh. The soup they serve is amazing ,a type of yellow Lentil soup. Hummus is a big Yes. Very good as well. I would come here whenever I could. You can eat inside or outside. Good prices and good Food.  Easy to get to  as well. Right in the shopping center on the South-West corner of Scottsdale Road and McDowell.

kXlzhF0F9hQ30TNydTHYQA.text: Yummy Greek food! I came here for a lunch meeting and definitely enjoyed the gyro wrap with fries.  The restaurant is very clean and the staff is friendly and professional for the most part. The fountain drink machine gives you large selection of sodas to choose from with unlimited refills.   It was my first time there so I wanted to try a nice wrap, but the menu definitely has various salads and other items I will definitely be trying soon. I would recommend this to anyone look for quick and good Greek food!

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. My wrap from Mika&#39;s Greek!

wCX8Sw1ZZoWPJxbgDOBDMw.text: Eat here all the time. Great food and great management/owners. Not sure who's working tonight but when I ordered rice her excuse was "we're closing no more rice" it's 8:40. You don't close for 20 minutes. I drove 20 min to get late night carbs.   Great place but being 20 minutes from closing isn't an excuse for the most important part of my meal.

AR8OsbyGJYKn9t7Nb7P7ag.text: So I traveled out of town and was craving for Greek food. I was in luck that there was a Greek restaurant near me. I checked the place out and it's a very clean and quiet establishment. I ordered their large platter just to fill my hunger from the order. I had the chicken souvlaki and gyro meat with a side of rice and salad. It also came with pita bread and veggies. Very delicious and filled me up! I also bought their jalapeno hummus which was very good. They have a coke dispensing machine that dispenses a variety of drinks from your usual sugary beverages to low calorie. I liked the place so much that I came back again after my run. I definitely recommend it. People are also friendly so that's a plus.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Ye2ogaTfVx957ccqZ8H94Q.text: Oohhh, I usually order a Greek Night Club pita with chicken, but upon feeling indecisive and learning that Mika's has online ordering...one of the meat choices listed was 1/2 chicken 1/2 gyro. Um, yes please! They had all sorts of options that you can customize with a simple click of a button (white or wheat pita? no onions? extra sauce? cut in half? etc. Boom! Done.) It even gave me a pick-up time and I received text notifications when my order was in-process and ready for pick-up. Having already paid online, I just walked in, was handed my bag, and went on my way. The whole process was very simple, convenient, and fast! Plus, I didn't have to mispronounce gyro over the phone. Hahaha. Score!   My pita was excellent ~ stuffed full of gyro, chicken, lettuce, tomato, onions, kalamata olives, tzatziki, and feta! Mmm! It was a little on the salty side, which I actually like, but just something to consider if you're sensitive to that sort of thing. The side greek salad was also very good. One of these days I'll get around to trying the lentil soup...  All in all, you can get a great, fast, filling meal here for less than $10, that you feel about eating. WIN.

kvQyBFR-5gT2X5lT2c4ujQ.text: Very good food, large portions, and good selection. I came with a family of five, and everyone loved it. Most people ordered their food to go, but we dined in. The restaurant was clean and nicely updated. The woman behind the counter was polite, served our food, and cleared our places, which was a nice surprise.

Tx-fBYUmHLBO6A3LM3pZwQ.text: Lately, I've been craving Greek food. And lucky for me, I've had a few opportunities in recent weeks to partake. Today, lunch at Mika's Greek was suggested by one of the quieter "culinary co-horts". I had no idea this awesome little joint was hiding in my backyard at the south end of Papago Plaza! Mika's is clean, modern and comfortable. They even have a Coke Freestyle dispenser. More on that later.  True to form, I ordered something "gyro" related. My Gyro Platter (with one meat and one side) was a generous portion and very reasonable for less than eight dollars. Lunch was filling, healthy and so tasty! I'm glad I was a creature of habit today, because it made it easier to make a decision in the face of so many options.  Now about that soda machine... Right after one of my co-workers filled his drink, the touch screen indicated that nearly all the choices were unavailable. All I had at this point was a cup of ice. An employee tried to fix this by re-booting the machine. She also offered me a bottle of Coke as an option. I declined and waited patiently, returning two more times, only to find the screen slowly re-booting. When the dispenser was working again, it was still missing about 80% of the options. However, I managed to dispense a surprisingly good Cherry Mello Yello Zero. Random, huh?  Unfortunately, when I returned for a refill, the machine looked like it was working properly, but my Cherry Coke was flat... I can't deduct a star, even after that. The food at Mika's was too good! See you again soon!

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. My delicious Gyro Platter!

JMRxfNm3jybn9dBJaf__Yw.text: This is my new favorite greek place! My boyfriend and I just discovered Mikas on Yelp and are hooked! I get the greek salad with chicken and he has been getting the gyro with a side salad. We also recently shared the hummus platter and it was amazing. If you like greek food, check Mikas out!

LhbOpUZDCo5sbEDe7kgWyw.text: Been here several times, definitely good, but not absolutely fantastic likes one of their closeby competitors!  The greek salad that accompanies the Gyro's that I always order is quite good!  The Gyro's just need a little more life to be over the threshold of average!

atixbZ65u2XmqNBzUN8VQw.text: Pretty much always get my lunch order incorrect. I took about a year off from going here because I was getting so frustrated. Decided to come back today and nothing has changed. I order the chicken Caesar pita and I always get something other than the chicken ceaser pita. One time I even got a gyro Caesar pita, gross. I don't know how they consistently mess it up, it has to be one of the simplest orders. Giving them two stars because the food is good, just don't call in, order there, ask for your receipt, review it for accuracy, and check your food before leaving.

2IyhXvXiqJ5-Kzwrfj1gMg.text: I've walked past this many times during my treks from McFate Brewing to Papago Brewing.  It's always looked neat and clean so I decided to give them a try this week for lunch.  They have the usual assortment of Greek/Mediterranean menu items.  I went with a gyro with half gyro meat and half chicken with a side greek salad.  I also had an iced tea and I have to say that their iced tea is particularly good.  The food itself was excellent, plenty of meat and good tzatziki sauce.  They even take the pits out of the olives on the salad!  This place is neat as a pin, the food is good and the service is fast and friendly.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Good iced tea

SiXudi7pMt00jEtt6UShXA.text: Well laid out, well lit, comfortable, clean, and professional and friendly service. AND AMAZING FOOD. I feel the desert was lacking though. I'm no expert but the baklava tasted old or over done. The pastry layer was really dry, airy, and flaky and the bottom layer was hard and chewy. The flavor was like baklava I've had before so I will likely give it a better look next time before I try the baklava again as I will be back.   It could have just been that the day ate here, the oven broke and the baklava was burnt. The menu is simple and offers and great assortment of options in food and beverages. I'm a stickler for good service so where Mika's Greek would usually get 5 stars, I wish I could give 7 1/2 stars for everything else.

JKNQg0MATBo_ibpy4ElnSA.text: I ordered to go. There was spit ontop of my soup. I had to go back and get a new one. Who is spitting in peoples food and why? They need a health inspector in there stat.  I will report this. They werent even apologetic.

sG13BcnI_5VNyXvGtqsGow.text: When we arrived a diligent young woman was mopping the floors which made me ask if they were closing.  No, she said.  Just cleaning.  And the place looked it.  Sparkling clean throughout.  I hope her boss knows how diligent she is about making the place look and smell clean.  Now to the food.  The way it works is that you go to the counter, order, pay and when it is ready they bring it to you.  We had the small platters which come with one side and pita.  Hubby had the greek chicken with the Greek salad.  I had the chicken souvlaki with french fries.  The greek chicken was chopped up chicken which made it a bit dry.  The Greek salad was good as were the pitas which accompanied each platter.  The chicken souvlaki was more like a shish-kabob, nice and juicy,  so mine was the better of the two dishes.  We also got a small side of yogurt which is traditional to Greek cuisine.   The young lady was friendly, the place was clean and the pricing was fair.  I would choose the chicken souvlaki over the greek chicken anytime.   It's worth a repeat visit.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Souvlaki was tasty!
Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Greek Chicken: chopped and a little dry.

mdcNdy76KMjnEadyjMaMlg.text: Made fresh. Good portions. Clean eating area. Favorite lunch spot Mom and I like to go.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Starter sampler

8bcl7Ie4p_VUpySlOcHnTg.text: A perfect delight for a lunch spot. Just enough space to bring the whole crew. Atmosphere is excellent, staff is super friendly.. and wait for it.. wait for it... the FOOD was Great!   Had the gyro Caesar style with fries and hummus on the side.  The small staff here gives you a very family friendly vibe. Someone even asked throughout my meal if I was enjoying everything. Make me happy to see entrepreneurs doing a great job.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Yummmmmm
Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Yummmmmm

noMBJho6QhBUNX1bMsoNDg.text: This is a hidden gem!!!  Not only is the food amazing, but it's a great value, service is awesome and The dinning room lobby is top notch and squeaky clean!!!  I had the Picado with rice today and it was as great as any pita or gyro I have ever eaten. Just spicy enough with peppers and onions and excellent meat. It was assembled well  on a real plate and consumed with expertise! The yellow rice was fluffy, hot, and well seasoned, It's also addictive! I wants some more!!!!  Its a small locally owned chain, and I am lucky enough to have one so close to home.  Myka's past the ultimate test for me, it's CRAVABLE!!!!

x-AUZ_2XQ9uNxDxBHeHJcA.text: A quick and cheap place to grab a bite of Mediterranean food. It has a very easy menu like salad, sandwiches or Greek fries.

_06VMk7CScuYRot4bSTsvA.text: Had very high hopes for this establishment. First of all my cousin and I came here hungry and ready to eat. Jose the not so friendly cashier kept looking at my chest. I went to sit down with my cousin who had already ordered her food, and got us a booth. I told her that I thought the cashier was creepy and how he kept looking at my chest, she looked at me and said that she thought he was looking at her chest as well.  Aside from that the food portions were a joke. My meat was cold, and it started to upset my stomach. French fries were good, just make sure to bring the salt because these had none!

KmEwlZ7u8p4kdsf8TJCmwA.text: I can't tell you what it tasted like because I never ate it. Instead of bringing the side of ranch I ordered, they must have just dumped it all on the pita despite the request for no dressing to be added. I could barely find the chicken that was drowning in the ranch & grease. I spent $20 to have a chicken pita delivered & then had to go out and buy lunch anyway. At least the Pepsi was pretty good & it showed up pretty fast...so for that I gave 2 stars.

7CyE2_ZItgkQrcax1OcF4A.text: I found this place on Yelp and have only been here for lunch on week days. They are pretty speedy I can usually get in and out within 30 to 35 mintues. Out of the dozen or so times I have been here the food has always been great.   The best part is no matter what I order I always get the portions, taste and great food. It's awesome. I strongly recommend you try this place out you won't regret it! Their beef is to die for!

fyLzJNxgbZtP_RfLhk9WWw.text: My wife is greek. I love greek food. She is hyper critical of any greek fod beyond her own or her mothers. So I don't get to eat it very often, unless she cooks it. I finally convinced her to try this place. Granted it's fast greek. And some items on the menu are middle eastern, not really greek, but that's ok. The tzaziki, a True measure of any greek food, was surprisingly good. I was also impressed with the dolmades. The veggie gyro though needed a bit more feta to make the taste more authentic.  Overall, a good experience for greek food. There are plenty of options for all palates, including a kids menu.

he1V1jPm-pBCkKOSA1Gz6A.text: Mika's Greek is one of the best. Always fresh and plenty of options. i've had their chicken, the lamb and the beef and all three are really great. It never disappoints!

FOwawM4aFMmjFkIaG_h6YQ.text: Well, I have only been here once and I liked it very much. My friend Alan had been here quite a few times, so I thought I would give it a try! It is located in a shopping center on the South West side of Scottsdale road, if that makes it easier to find it. Very simple inside,which is really all it needs to be. We ate outside because, it was a beautiful day. Not too hot yet. We ordered our food and then took a seat outside. Intending to go back in to collect our plates. One of the ladies was nice enough to bring it out to us. I got the gyro and lentil soup. I only got the soup because Alan said he really liked it. I really liked it as well! Very good, as well as very healthy. I did not get the fries because other reviews said they were cold many times. I instead got the Humus which was really good and tasted very fresh. I took a photo of Alan's meal. His was wonderful as well. I want to go back again and check it out some more. The one thing that was a bummer, no hot drinks. such as Hot teas.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Falafel, hummus, grape leave rolls

wjm_GFzGS82X3yoVH9Q4yQ.text: Terrible customer service. This was always my favorite place. Staff had no idea what they were doing and also lied when trying to help me. I don't know that I will be back. Seemed they didn't care to help a customer when there was a problem with their business.

PExrP5EQYhAdhDNEegrYNA.text: I am so happy I got a chance to stop by here during my short time in Phoenix. I was able to get some lunch here during work and ordered a pita with their grilled beef. So delicious! I ended up getting the spicier one as well with jalapenos and was quite surprised on how much of a kick it had. Their white sauce was delicious. They're also really reasonable and would definitely recommend for lunch or getting a Greek fix!

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Pita sandwich with beef

ZSlNk1jzJz8ev-hg3YhxjA.text: First time there today for lunch and I am definitely a fan now.  The salad is excellent, the chicken moist and tender.  The hummus and pita starter is delicious too!    I will definitely be going back.

rxXb7P-lLbDUg2isv42qTg.text: We love this place!  I work at ASU Skysong and my coworkers and I frequent this shop for lunch.  The service is always great, the food is good and the baklava is to die for!  We also have them cater for our office on occasion and they have never disappointed.  Definitely a good place to check out.

YfuCkkbeCTVkicaW43db8A.text: ok..  so there is this George's Gyros, and one on McKellips.  I am a Greek Salad lover so get them often.  Unfortunately i have to say that the George's on McKellips does a much better Greek Salad.  Its 50 cents more, but you get a lot more salad along w/ more peppers, cucumbers and olives.  And they also throw in a yummy piece of garlic bread.  Georges on Scottsdale does have a good salad, it is just not up to par to the one you get from Mckellips.  so!  I am hoping that they will read this and raise the bar a bit :-)

Na12scc2sD2ojgejGM4Iuw.text: This neighborhood niche is one of my favorite local restaurants. Give this place a shot people... Good guys...great food..!

srGKH23dKXodpoXJlw96rA.text: Great food and service. They're quick and friendly. I usually get the plate with grilled chicken and it's more than enough food. If I am really hungry, I get the large :)  Pita is always fresh and hot as well. No complaints. I go here at least once a week.

uI4-8leS51VOr1vXk65YUA.text: We dropped in and took home chicken souvlaki and a gyro. It was really good, a bit dry but I think taking out does that. I just wanted more tzatziki sauce but I was already home. So order extra or you will be crying in your gyro. I would eat here again. The salad was standard, all was tasty.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Gyro
Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Grilled chicken

g5MiBnN8i_MzYkaLUFbHdw.text: 4 stars for the food but 3 for the ordering issues. We have been here soooo many times and I think at least 50% of the time the order is wrong in some way. It's a bummer because there is a lot of potential here they just can't get organized for some reason. But hey, we keep going here so like I said the food is pretty darn good.

y-WtsJ0bF6Pczpa0YwhlIA.text: Went to this place based on reviews. Its similar to pita jungle. Have different gyro wrap and plate options. All the food was super fresh and delicious. You order at the counter and they have a bunch of tables setup.  Good place if you have small kids as they have good chicken and rice options.   Nice reasonably priced place for some middle eastern or Greek food.

7SNUJDPLiaC652D-Husz4g.text: I wish I could give a half star (when will Yelp add that?!).  I've been to another Mika's Greek place, and it was really good.  This one, for some reason, didn't seem quite as good.  Staff was fine.  Food was fine.  Not great.  But it was fine.  I had the gyros plate.  I can't quite put my finger on it, but the flavors just weren't as robust and exciting as other Greek places.  So I can't quite say "I"m a fan", but it seems to me that "A-OK" is a little weak.  My rating really is 3.5 stars.  I will say it was probably a bad idea to get the hummus sauce.  I should have stayed with the traditional tatziki.  That just works better with gyros, in my opinion.

E7Y_55buii9dmSnsKUxvHw.text: Upon entry, the place was very clean!  I personally was confused at the way the menu works. I guess you pick your selections and proteins and whatnot. I prefer to close my eyes and point when the choosing gets too difficult.   I feel as though the guy may have been a bit frustrated with me since he began asking me what I'd like and I simply told him to make it the best way it tastes. He kept his patience and managed to pick something that was pretty tasty. I believe I ended up with humus, chicken, falafel and pita.   It was fresh, it was good. No complaints at all. If in the area and it crossed my mind, I'd go back and have some more. Will it stand out in my mind to make an extra trip? Probably not. Nonetheless, still delicious.

j0AJ18uymicQVz2nIpRPLg.text: Great place for "Greek" food. Fast service, nice people, tasty gyros. This place seems to be the favorite of the Local National Guard base.   I had the "traditional gyro" with fries. The fries were very good.  The gyro sandwich was delicious.

cAjiZpYQGg7Hmw8BxFIXKw.text: Awesome food, outstanding place for a vegetarian to eat.   Ordered via grubhub to my hotel and truly hit the spot. Ordered a Mediterranean Pita thing, and their Greek fries, both made vegetarian by choosing 'dolma' as the protein option. My company was paying, so I probably ordered too much food, but it was sooooo good I ended up eating all of it and then ordered again two nights later because I just had to eat here again before I left town.

UYa7naQBLjKJ6dzdPCE5yQ.text: All of the reviews were spot on. The food was good and the place was packed--always a good sign. I sat down to eat rather than eating and running. The flow was steady. I will definitely be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Plate with lots of food for the price.

oCfhI1bBL6DhSVObulA2Qw.text: Loved this place! I had the gyro plate with soup for a side.  It was all fresh and delicious! The place is also very clean and tastefully decorated.  The staff was friendly and dedicated to what they are doing.  I will be back often for sure!

B-B0ZUcAp33A-7Ns0Qq17w.text: I ate here for lunch today. The menu was inexpensive and the food itself felt very fresh.  Great lunch spot or takeout.

jT34Iz-XQvNcLtvwKRnz0Q.text: I was running errands in the area & super hungry. Found their Yelp page & was a little apprehensive because of the location. Unfortunately, Papago Plaza has really seen better days. I have never been to a Mika's before, I didn't know they were a franchise. I was pleasantly surprised! The newly remodeled interior was clean, open & inviting. The staff was helpful & courteous. The food was fresh and prepared to order. I had the chicken souvlaki pita, Mediterranean style. Naturally, I chose fries for my side & they were super crispy right out of the fryer. I will definitely try them again, and I see that delivery on Grubhub is also an option, which is extra convenient!

Uy94uejpCtkDTApiDEwUxA.text: Super yummy greek food. Fast yet authentic.  We had Mediterranean grilled chicken gyro and rice.  The pita was soft and warm. Wife had Lentil soup which she really liked.  They gave her extra hummus in place of tzatziki sauce since she is dairy free.  Highly recommend and we'll be back.

ubKQeqfwtvlP0xlbO6nYaQ.text: This is pretty decent fast-casual Greek food. It's clean and modern/simple looking inside, and the prices are fair. The only staff member I talked to seemed nice enough. It may not be one of my top Greek places in the valley, but I really have no complaints regarding my visit either.

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

KY_vKuEk6kn137gg3JMOYg.text: Have only been there once. The food for the most part was good but nothing to really WOW. Ordered a platter and a side of hummus to go. Was very disappointed that the Good sized platter only comes with one taziki that was pretty thin and they forgot the side of hummus. By the time I went back, picked up the hummus, paid for more taziki and got home the food and soup was cold. Tried heating it back up for a minute and didn't turn out well. Will try again one day but so far haven't been back since.

SexVGsDK7lwckERAiCzwhw.text: My boss got us to go food from Mika's, which we have named "Fake George's", only because they used to be named George's, but George's Famous is less than a block away, so they had to change. The interior was clean, with a few tables.   The menu had your normal Greek stuff, but was confusing to me. I wanted a falafel pita, but only saw falafel as a platter, but the lady said it was also a pita. The menu didn't reflect that, so I wonder what else I'm missing out on.  The falafel was different, but I liked it. Maybe nuts in it? Couldn't put my finger on it. It was cooked well, and was not over-sauced. The side salad I got to go with it was fresh, and I liked the dressing. My boss got the Gyro platter or salad with gyro meat...something like that. She loves it.  The food came out really quickly, and the counter service was friendly.

Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Menu board

KVaDEIEs5gWkhAs2nZfIAw.text: Overpriced for mediocre food it was dry and honestly tasted old like it's been sitting out.  The place was empty.  They even charge $1.00 for the smallest size tzazki sauce because apparently it does not come with your meal.

iP_9YM5nC4Vuy9HFkrkLoA.text: Quick service, good portions and very tasty. I had the original wrap with beef and lamb. Hard to find as it's so dark in parking lot.

9766V5gcExoYmqdTfCtUtg.text: Great little Greek joint with some unique and cool menu items. I always get the Diablo.  Also, the staff is always friendly and quick with the order. The restaurant is always clean too. Good job Mika's!

fvcMJSqYBp7iVUxwhXzKOQ.text: We walk in and the place is kept very clean and the lady at the cashier is friendly and greeted us when we walked in. We ordered a meat gyro, rice, falafel, salad, pita, and baklava. Everything was very tasty and cleanly served on white dishes. The staff was kind and you can see into the kitchen and realize it is orderly.   Will be coming back for sure!

zzm_NYaf8B59TaCVX8ZVuw.text: Mika's was great! Not only the food was great and very reasonable, staff is friendly and knowledgable about everything on the menu. The owner is right there in the front  talking to the customers, I will definately be back!

urA6SQzG4scBchx0cTqwjw.text: Beautiful place, very modern and classic. Super sweet staff...Awesome hidden gem in this area:)

B27FhZGMrr6P2dSOymXhjQ.text: Great food! Awesome service! But above all, one of the cleanest restaurants I've ever been to. I would recommend this restaurant in a heart beat.

p_EmtdIZUyZynlVD8OmcEQ.text: One of the better hummuses I've had in AZ and the gyros are delicious. The prices are reasonable as well.

eCdFX-ZOSOtD926ii1SCKQ.text: First time here and will definitely be back! I had the original Picato and it was FANTASTIC!!!! The place was very clean and the staff was well versed on the menu and very friendly and helpful! Can't wait to come back and try something else!!

cdAAp_VlqsyIyzLPWOy57Q.text: Great food! Great atmosphere! And great staff! 5 stars is an understatement. I would recommend this place to everyone!!! Can't wait to go back and try the rest of the menu!!

HyZ4E8pr2aZ3Xeln-DJXcA.text: Fantastic!!!!!  Grilled chicken pitta and gyro picante ordered with salads absolutely great loads of flavor great portion size and great value. Defiantly become a regular haunt. Staff were so helpful and happy great to chat with while waiting for the awesome food

sha15NS9PYiQHAAXFXRIpA.text: Loved everything!! Had a Greek salad with gyro and about licked the plate. Best Gyros, best tzaziki and super clean. Awesome!

reOtREvhhyC9zGB-QfK3Vw.text: It's pretty good. The seating//dining area could use a little enhancement but the food is about right for the price. Good falafel!

FMoojyrCh5LqgcLDueyrvQ.text: Best place in the valley for a gyro or Greek salad. The gyro picado is my favorite. Always made perfectly, fresh and juicy. The restaurant is clean and the staff is always friendly. They have other locations which are equally great.

rmhe2FrjdcG3fj7LuiQhsQ.text: Nice interior and nice music. However, I was not very impressed with the vegan options. I got the falafel pita and there were like 4 small pieces of tomato and 5 small pieces of onion, and 4 large falafel. I would opt for 3 falafel and lots more veggies.

qraViLmQdMvuZtxWJ7CRWw.text: Rock-solid new design. The Chipotle of gyros in Scottsdale. Highly recommend the Picado!

bdh664i4SxDu9DaZ92xq6w.text: So delicious! Fresh grilled chicken and yummy salad! Owner is very attractive too :) should be open on Sundays though!

AMddWZg4UhdISnJKHG9ZOg.text: So amazing! Probably the closest thing to an authentic Greek gyro i have had since I moved back from Greece a year ago. Kalo!!

nBwsl1bfQ-Q5TPwCCrv-lg.text: So I've been out biking all afternoon and it's still a gorgeous day so I want to sit outside somewhere and eat something. I stop at this little Gyros shop in an obscure corner of Papago Plaza for the sole reason that it has a great outdoor seating spot -wide, well shaded, far enough from the street and a decent view over Skysong with a bit of the Supes peaking through.  And the food is fantastic!! I had the chicken Pita, which was astoundingly tasty, with a great salad and it's $6.25? How is that possible? And the service (I think that was George?) couldn't have been better. And the place inside is clean and bright.   Nobody could ask for more.

QBo_yMmKn-ggn0daLXPGmQ.text: This place is fantastic! Scottsdale needed a good, fresh Greek place that wasn't run by a bunch of dodgy characters. Love the atmosphere but nothing tops the food. Healthy, fresh & delicious!

ZoIaXEEeTtKsGFpJoZxRpA.text: Tasty and fresh.   Great value. Clean.  Friendly.  Definitely worth a try.  And you'll be back.

De2LlAI9wyE0nDMsS-qnxw.text: some of the best hummus i've had in a long time! the remodel (from the previous gyro restaurant) is gorgeous. no more of the ubiquitous blue & white "greek" theme. i also had a greek salad with chicken & it was delicious as well. i will go back for more.

pzRMZ8N5JrA8TkSa-QBq5A.text: The service was very nice! I haven't really eaten Greek food before and the last was really nice explaining the differences between the meals. I'd liked it a lot

fni7x4uYoZMPwkYQQAYmPg.text: Food was very good, tried the gyro picado '& a pleasant spice to the meat.

TLoAaOtLwL3cowjPvSWByQ.text: Great gyros! The meat is not dry and is flavorful. Their appetizers are delicious and great for sharing.   The place was clean and is usually not busy at all. Both times I went now.. The second time had a really grumpy looking server. The music playing was very odd. Will go if I'm in the area and in the mood but would not drive for it.

Zz5YrfTCM5qowB78kMaubA.text: Not the best chicken. It appears to be pre-cut chicken strips and they are not marinated well or seasoned. Edible, but not the best chicken that could be used. Side salad is kinda tiny as well with hardly any feta cheese present in a greek salad. Plus the pita did not hold up well to-go. It steamed itself in the plastic and came out steamed, wet and clammy. Second time not the charm.

WEjRdKKkUBpkt3KNl6jphQ.text: Best gyro meat I've ever tasted, plus the owner has an infectious smile!

eI3E7uoEbNykdUaJVNj6Kg.text: I tried this place for the first time a week ago and I was really impressed. Everything was really fresh. I had the Gyro plate with rice. You can tell that they do really care about there customers. I can tell it was really clean and new. This place was built off tradition. Great place to stop into you want to get something fresh and quick.

VLJAn38Xud9wvhFDO-kjhQ.text: This place was soon good I thought no place would make a better Gyro the Pita Jungle so glad to see I was wrong. It may be a little tucked away but once you find it you will be glad that you did. The lady at the counter was so nice and informative and on a plus didn't try to shave information at us or try to over sell something.

4Y7JECx9FfbMqCdMKpNXGg.text: First time here - was great! Hummus was awesome, food was great. Excellent service too - will be back.

RghOoGyEGlKMViWL-bCTWQ.text: Extremely clean and professional along with GREAT tasting food. I didn't know I liked Greek food until I ate here. Also do not let the outside persuade you since it looks very old from the sun, the inside is entirely new and modern. I highly recommend giving it a try

3jpIfGqdkSzeo1c2GW-pHQ.text: This place is the real deal..  Went for lunch on a Saturday before Labor Day.  The place was pretty quiet.  Nice decor, very friendly staff, and the food was excellent.  Chicken served with Greek salad was fresh, juicy and perfectly grilled.  Greekumbers sounded goofy, but they tasted great - cucumbers, tzaziki and feta.  Surprisingly good...  Looking forward to the next visit!

ihWE3TaWDKInw2_lvfRc9w.text: An out of town friend and I stopped here today on our way to the Desert Botanical Gardens.  Clean Friendly Staff Quick Service Really Yummy Food!  Thanks!

8Uogrp4hVgxcOvKyL000Tg.text: Nice little place with nice people. Tried jalapeno hummus, large palate with grilled Greek chicken and falafel. Food is awesome! Would be perfect if a couple more beverage options are there.

uRxqV9vPVaHQP_Arj7QpDg.text: This place is awesome! Delicious food and friendly, professional service.  Love love love the garlic lemon lentil soup. And the baklava--yummy!

y9FHTjVyNBiRusMUqqhxkQ.text: Everything we've had here, over several different visits, has been really great - fresh, and very tasty.  I love Greek food, and for a quick/casual restaurant, Mika's hits the spot.  The restaurant is modern, clean, and very pleasant. The staff is always super nice.  Have absolutely no complaints, and am actually headed there again tonight, to grab a quick bite with my husband!

6njAOEUdxuQTU9alWEc1UQ.text: I loved this little Greek place! Definitely off the beaten path, but clean, modern and the food was delicious. I had the gyro platter with fries and shared a baklava for dessert. The gyro was a bit different than I expected- pita triangles served alongside the meat and toppings instead of a pre-made gyro - but so delicious that I ate more than I should have. Baklava is not my favorite, but this version was great. I'll definitely be back!

A33x-ShDU0ut7_6j-EfIXA.text: Excellent Greek food. Service was great and fast. The flavors were full and bold. I had a small platter with gyro meat and side Greek salad. My friend had the Diablo gyro. I will def. return.

BCLdiPjDCpGGrxPuYEpA7A.text: Great customer service and GREAT FOOD!!!! shout out to Daniel for assisting me and my friend  this evening. Go ahead and try it out u won't be disappointed you'll only keep coming back for more

-bvvu6SDdrtE7lBnVsnMLQ.text: The Gyro was incredible. The original hummus was bland but that wont stop me from coming back!

TWWOP3R_rrrFhSapkILQWw.text: I personally live down the street. I love this place. They really have a great menu. There fast and friendly and to be honest you really can't beat the service here! If I was looking for the food again I would definitely come here.

pojirsRzSaWqbteEaFHR5g.text: THA BOMB!!! Food was awesome, place was nice and clean, and to top it off the cashier/waiter was hot!

u9-28VS7tEIHTSt--rzP8w.text: My go to spot if I'm looking for a quick healthy option. Food is tasty with great quality ingredients. Not your typical greasy late night Greek spot. The restaurant itself was recently remodeled and very cute inside and service is always very fast.

0tZVSUSfEsaoT-4o3IKSLg.text: First time I have been here, like others I was impressed by the cleanliness and modern feel of the building. What really stood out though was the food. I had the Greekpeno pita with the beef souvlaki which was wonderfully spiced. The Greek fries we're also amazing with the dressing and feta generous put on top of the fries. I thought the peppers would overpower the dish but it all mingled very well together. Service was great and the employees were nice.  Will definitely be back again!

4CPhUx2sW0e1A4yETqjxmw.text: I love this place. I had the gyro which comes with their greek fries and it was amazing. Everything was so fresh. I definitely intend to be a regular and check out the rest of their menu. Stay tuned.

G00CyG84GUEwx_dJpvkedA.text: I have been here a few times before and even ordered it to-go to take back home with me! The Mediterranean pita is delicious, absolutely in LOVE with the Greek fries, and the chicken caeser one is pretty good too! Highly recommend this place!

EiL8ryDmiaRxe7R9aDC_pw.text: This is a great place for a quick authentic Mediterranean style meal. The food tasted great, the staff was friendly, and most importantly the place was very clean. We will be back for sure!

niLx0U92wMNrxSeXVKY_QA.text: Awesome little Greek place!! I just moved in across the street & scored with this being my favorite food! I could live on hummus and theirs ROCKS!! The jalapeno hummus is superb! Best I've ever tasted & plain is excellent but has lots of garlic. Which is good for some & some not... I loved it!! Falafel is obviously homemade vs. Pasty mix. To go order was fast, easy & Christian gave great friendly reception!! Inside very nice, clean cut & a bit above average strip mall casual! Outdoor seating available. I'll be a regular...  Check them out!!  I would give 5 stars if they had Babaganoush!!

lU2WO3fX_CIWrhD13UkBaQ.text: Excellent food in a casual atmosphere. Prices are reasonable and servings generous. I definitely recommend it

vrDgD0QzwdfC7wEZ1oK4xg.text: This very nice fast casual restaurant is clean, cool and very delicious!   Some of the best Greek food that I have ever had.   Better than what I've had in Greece.   Do yourself a favor and give this place a try...you won't be sorry!

kX9_6wZ4UHiubwUqK5nYcg.text: Had the greek chicken sandwich, fries and salad... I wish the fries where freshly cooked instead of out of a warmer... I'd go back in the future - not a bad lunch... Decent price sandwich was good salad just they way i like it.

2J_fl1imKD6TLX9jiAA4Dw.text: Yum! The food is great, the restaurant is clean and the team was friendly and quick! The menu provides various options and being close to work is a plus as well. I highly recommend the Picado Pita.. Your traditional gyro with a kick of jalapeno!

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Picado Gyro and Greek Side Salad

teFbr4az5aUE9gMB1p7JKw.text: Fast friendly service, fresh Greek salad, comfortable open atmosphere, a great place for lunch.

iyjTbxdYZTTV2v2AjmE9NQ.text: Met a gf here for lunch. What a delight. The place smelled like fresh cut cucumber. You order in line and then sit. They bring the food out to you. I ordered a hummus duo and Greek salad. The hummus was delicious. The salad was fresh and perfectly zesty!  The restaurant quickly filled up and I realized that many people already know about this gem in south Scottsdale. I'll be back.

PfIGRIXRjwLphtL8N0Cc1Q.text: Simply wonderful & delicious. Our first experience was great. The staff is friendly, the building is clean & modern and the food was delicious. We ordered the chicken platter and gyro platter- each come with two sides of your choice so we got 2 salads, rice and gyro fries for our sides! Yum!   If you're a big soda drinker, they have the Coca-Cola Freestyle drink machine with 100+ different sodas and flavor combos. I rarely order a drink and I had to get one just to try it. Vanilla Rootbeer and Vanilla Gingerale- yes please!   We just moved to this side of town and I can't wait to go back again :)

Xl7MK1VMI0S2292iEDWO-w.text: I LOVE THIS PLACE! I remember years ago eating at a Greek place in the same plaza that was not so good. I was dying for Greek and went here thinking it was the same place, not the case! I was incredibly surprised, I eat here at least weekly and if I was on vacation I'd eat there daily. Everything is delicious!

Yr6sozH8TqkV9GrlbdA5fw.text: Nothing special here, just food that is quick, cheap, and good. Stopped by after work to grab a quick dinner, $8.58 well spent. Had the greek beef night club souvlaki, with lentin soup. Food was pretty decent, have had better for the price. The lady at the cash register was friendly, and there is a bench by the entrance setup specifically for to-go patrons. I may give this place another chance next time I am in Scottsdale.

C_cX9DfTmn3QnvG1qy7gPA.text: Nice place. Very modern and clean. Everyone seems very friendly. Prices are reasonable. I wouldn't say I ever crave their food, but it's basic Mediterranean selection. Never had anything bad here though. Been here multiple times and I will keep returning. Like it better than the other Greek/Mediterranean restaurants in the neighborhood. They're fairly quick too. Good gyros and Greek salad!

EM3Ia_rKAdMQiwoWrpFLdg.text: WOW. I am sitting here with a full belly, absolutely impressed with the meal I just had. Fresh, flavorful and not too heavy. If I hadn't eaten like a million of the french fries, it would probably pass as healthy.  The owner was really nice and my to-go order was up quickly. It's right next to British Open Pub, so I can see a few post-drink meals happening in my future!   Oh, the hummus was AMAZING. When I saw it I expected it to be a little gritty and bland, but it was anything but. It has a great flavor but not too lemony or garlicy. Can't put my finger on exactly what is so awesome about it, but it is. Actually, even now as I'm as uncomfortably full as I am, I'm thinking about having another bite of it...

photos.caption: Photo of Mika's Greek - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

OT_PlY2LkeJnXTpudyxD3Q.text: Outstanding food at reasonable prices. I had the gyro platter with dolmas, and all were tasty!  Highly recommend giving this place a try.

OpSwyaetVs8yN4-KIFvfhQ.text: I tried this place for the first time last night, and man was I pleasantly surprised. I got the gyropeno and definitely was full after. They gave a generous portion of gyro meat as well as sauces. We took it to go, but the restaurant was very clean when we picked it up. The girl who rang us up was super nice and made small talk while I waited. I will definitely be back to try more of the menu :)

CrcUZLERoIVedGtBiEGs_w.text: Food was great and the waitress was very helpful when I couldn't decide what To get! Will come back!

a-CTkw9aQJ5TahyibxHzUQ.text: Great fast Greek place. Food has always been great. Interior is fairly modern and very clean ad organized.

z5yxzUUFGonFd1MPZfj7hw.text: Three of us went at 5pm Saturday before Valentine's Day.  We wanted a place that wouldn't be inundated with celebrants, one that was a locally owned one and someplace we haven't been before.  Mika's Greek fit the bill perfectly!               First impression:  just like so many Yelp reviews, it was hard to find.  I thought there was a Mediterranean place on the west side of the plaza... nope... there was a pizza place that has a huge ad for GYROS in the front window.  That was misleading.  The man there, helped us when we asked where Mika's was and he kindly pointed.  We will have to stop there for pizza sometime, since he did help us find it.  Mika's is on the south part of Papago Plaza, next to the British Pub.      Second impression:   CLEAN!  It was a crisp clean interior design and modern.  I really liked it.      Next:  We were to order at the front  counter and they would bring it to us.  A little awkward with one of us with a cane, and having never been there... but we were just new to the place.... next time will be easy peasy.        Next:   WOWOWOWOW the food was great!  We ordered the Greek Sampler and my favorite part was the hummus, tzatziki and pita.  Very quickly after that, our entrees arrived.  Each of us had ordered pitas.  The chicken caesar pita was said to have really tender delicious chicken... the Original pita was yummy with extra tzatziki... and the Diablo pita was very much enjoyed by our friend.  The pitas come with a side.   Our choices of rice and salad worked very well with our pitas.      Desert was very very tempting, but with having had the sampler before the meal, we look forward to having the honey walnut baklava another time.   I would highly recommend going.
